name: Volos
comments: This package.json is here so we can get dependencies installed to run tests. Install mocha and istanbul globally.

scripts.test: mocha -u exports -R spec cache/memory/test cache/redis/test cache/test/middlewaretest.js management/redis/test oauth/redis/test quota/memory/test quota/redis/test quota/test/middlewaretest.js
scripts.test-apigee: mocha -u exports -R spec cache/apigee/test management/apigee/test oauth/apigee quota/apigee/test
scripts.cover: ROLLING_TESTS=true istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports -R spec cache/memory/test cache/redis/test cache/test/middlewaretest.js management/redis/test oauth/redis/test quota/memory/test quota/redis/test quota/test/middlewaretest.js
